
::: {.question}

**Convertible Bond — Conversion Price (Quiz-Utils Layout)**

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
set.seed(805)
face_value <- 1000
conversion_ratio <- round(rnorm(1, mean = 40, sd = 3), 2)
conversion_price <- face_value / conversion_ratio
conv_price_round <- round(conversion_price, 2)
conv_price_ans   <- round(conversion_price, 0)
cat(sprintf("Q: You own a bond with a face value of $%d and a conversion ratio of <b>%1.2f</b>.", 
            face_value, conversion_ratio))
```

::: {.question-block}
<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault();" style="display:flex; gap:8px; align-items:center;">
  <label for="module6_num_q5"><strong>Answer (conversion price, $):</strong></label>
  <input type="number" id="module6_num_q5" name="module6_num_q5" step="0.01" style="width:220px;"
         data-correct-answer=`r conv_price_ans` data-tolerance="1" />
</form>

<div id="feedback-module6_num_q5" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
✅ <strong>Conversion price</strong> = Face / Ratio = `r face_value` / `r conversion_ratio` = 
<strong>$ `r conv_price_round`</strong>. (We accept rounded to the nearest dollar.)
</div>
